q: Mitt Romney got a David Letterman plug for his book, ''No Apology,'' and then stood, sans-tie, to announce a casual, comically self-deprecating lineup of ''Things You Don't Know About Mitt Romney .'' 10. Mitt Romney is short for Mitt-thew. 9. I can't begin my day until I've read the Washington Post and Kim Kardashian 's Tweets. 8. I'm the guy in the photo that comes with your picture frame. 7.
